description: Scene creation popup appeared twice - Access denied on file move
rootCause: Scene Polecat agent was interrupted by user, but MCP command had already been sent. Agent was re-spawned or command was retried, causing duplicate scene creation attempt. Unity cannot overwrite an existing scene file via temp file move.
resolution: Dismissed popup (Cancel). Scene file was successfully created on first attempt.
prevention: Layer 6 orchestration needs: 1) Track in-flight MCP commands 2) Check if asset exists before creating 3) Use idempotent operations where possible

layerFaultAttribution.L6: Yes - Agent interruption handling missing, no idempotency check
